Name: Simpler Buff Icons
Author: Charlignon
Description:
Random raid buff popped in your status bar and you don't know what it is, but you are too lazy to learn every single buff from all classes ? (looking at you SCH)
This mod replace all unique buff icons by generic, easy to understand status icons :)
It is recommended that you disable it for classes you play, since you will learn them anyway
---
HOW TO USE

- Check all classes for which you don't know the spells/icons
- Uncheck all classes for which you want to keep the game icons. (Recommended for classes you play)
- You won't see the changes until the UI is reloaded. To do that, either disconnect and login again, or talk to the Esthetician in your room.
